author: @emilypadhi8382
text: Thanks for this video! There is an error in your code early in this video.   You wrote:  colnames(data.matrix) <- c(   + paste("wt", 1:5, sep = ""),  + paste("ko", 1:5, sep = ""))  It should be:  colnames(data.matrix) <- c(      paste("wt", 1:5, sep = ""),       paste("ko", 1:5, sep = ""))  I couldn't get your code to work as written. Maybe we are using different versions of R? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
